name: Agora Cloud Player Server
description: An example of a simple Node/Express server that can invoke cloud player

APP_ID.description: Agora App ID: Login to the Agora.io Developer Dashboard (http://dashboard.agora.io), and navigate to the "Projects" tab to get this value

REST_KEY.description: Agora RESTful API Key: Login to the Agora Developer Dashboard (http://dashboard.agora.io), and navigate to the "RESTful API" menu to get this value

REST_SECRET.description: Agora RESTful API Secret: Login to the Agora Developer Dashboard (http://dashboard.agora.io), and navigate to the "RESTful API" menu to get this value
